name: VDoc Software
tag_list: ecm, bpm, apps, edm, portail, intranet, business-applications
overview:
A collaborative solutions vendor VDoc Software has produced the first business-oriented collaborative applications generator. This out-of-the-box solution called VDoc features all the modules (Business Process Management, electronic document management, Web content management, SDK, data universe, user interface, administration interface, etc.) required for designing and generating a genuine business solution. VDoc is therefore able to offer companies concrete responses to their needs for traceability, coordination, collaboration and sharing of information.

A powerful ecosystem VDoc Software runs an ecosystem of vendors, integrators and business specialists who have chosen its VDoc technology. These partnerships feed in functional enhancements to the generator by opening it up to new usages (document capture, electronic signature, etc.).

Collaborative business solutions In conjunction with these partners, VDoc Software has also created VDoc Apps, the catalogue of ready-to-use business solutions. Quality departments, purchasing departments, industrial departments, IT departments,… town halls, laboratories, SMEs, hospitals, users of SAP, Sage or Lefebvre Software: whoever you are, you’re sure to find the solution most suited to your needs in VDoc Apps. Modularity, scalability and ease of use also characterize each of these solutions.
